newsitem.title: LITHUANIA: LITHUANIA-TRADE DEFICIT 366.5 MLN LITAS IN JANUARY.
newsitem.headline: LITHUANIA-TRADE DEFICIT 366.5 MLN LITAS IN JANUARY.

text.p: department said on Wednesday that exports in January were 1.095
billion litas and imports came to 1.461 billion litas.
Preliminary data showed that the total foreign trade deficit
was 366.5 million litas in January, the statistics department
Exports in January 1997 showed a 16.5 percent increase of
16.5 percent compared to the same period in 1996 while imports
Lithuania's major trading partners in January. All figures
